turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, I'd like to order a coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, where did you want to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Starbucks on South Virginia Street in Reno, Nevada.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: awesome, i found the location you were talking about. what did you want to order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: aww bummer. looks like that drink is out of season. did you want another drink?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what size did you want?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and did you have a milk preference in that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so you want a trenta hot chocolate with whole milk from starbucks on south virginia street in reno nevada.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $3.50 is your total. should i charge the card on file now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your drink has been ordered and it should be ready for pick up in 4 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i'll send over your receipt to your mobile device via text message shortly.
